preqs: OHS1000 and either GLS1231 or GLS1242 or VIS1112 OR APA1312

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {GLS1211, GLS1231} or  Must have passed 48 (I/W) credit points from units owned by {50000562})

description: This unit provides a rigorous program to broaden students awareness of conceptual approaches to Glass Blowing and sculpting with molten glass. Continued research and skill development will foster the acquisition of a personal visual language, utilising the unique optical and material qualities of glass.  Students will create projects with an emphasis on multidisciplinary approaches.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
